title: Clay and Buck Sound Off H2 - The Best From This Week - Oct 23 2021
itunes:title: Clay and Buck Sound Off H2 - The Best From This Week - Oct 23 2021
description:
Clay and Buck Sound Off H2 - The Best From This Week - Oct 23 2021

Independents are having Biden remorse. Washington Post: Don’t rant about short-staffed stores and supply chain woes -- you're spoiled! Biden’s slogan has been ‘Build Back Better.’ It really should be ‘Lower Your Expectations.’ Biden makes Carter look like a successful president. Southwest Airlines drops plan to put unvaccinated staff on unpaid leave. Washington State University fires head football coach for refusing covid-19 vaccine. With rising crime, blue cities are about to lose thousands of police officers because of mandates, yet downtown Portland, Oregon, is anarchy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
